Race.SpecificTitle: Benton Fire Dist. No. 4 -- 20 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Benton Fire District No. 4 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Benton Fire District No. 4 of the Parish of Bossier, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a twenty (20) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $2,949,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, inclusive, to provide for capital improvements, equipment purchase, operation and maintenance of fire protection facilities in said District?
